source_sentence: 寶星陀羅尼經卷第九
translation: Jewel Star Dhāraṇī Sutra, Volume 9

source_sentence: 唐天竺三藏波羅頗蜜多羅譯
translation: Translated by the Tang Indian Tripiṭaka Prabhākaramitra

source_sentence: 擁護品之餘
translation: except for the category of the hugger

source_sentence: 「◎唯置作五逆者、誹謗正法者、謗無賢聖者，身口意業所作之惡業及果報，一切皆滅。
translation: "．Only those who commit the five heinous acts, those who denigrate the right teaching, and those who denigrate the lack of good and noble people will all cease to have the bad actions and results of their physical, verbal, and mental actions.

source_sentence: 若此法門乃至經卷，若但書持置於宅中，彼等所有諸業煩惱，能為障礙量等須彌，皆悉消滅。
translation: If you simply write and hold this teaching or even the sūtra scroll in your house, all of their karmic afflictions and afflictions that can create an obstruction amounting to Sumeru will all cease.

source_sentence: 一切善根悉得增長，一切善分皆悉滿足，意所悕望皆悉成就，身口意善悉當增長。
translation: All good roots will grow, all good parts will be fulfilled, all the desires of the mind will be fulfilled, and the goodness of body, speech, and thought will all grow.

source_sentence: 一切惡見斷滅無餘，一切怨敵以法調伏。
translation: All bad views are ended without remainder, and all enemies are subdued by the Dharma.

source_sentence: 一切微細寂滅之道悉當得入，以此一切諸佛世尊所共護持大集陀羅尼法門加護力故。
translation: All subtle paths to cessation will be fully entered, thanks to the protective power of the great collection of dharma teachings that are jointly upheld by all the buddhas and world-honored ones.

source_sentence: 「隨所有國此陀羅尼法門當流行地，能令彼地肥膩精味倍上成就，美果妙味當得增長，苦辛惡味當得遠離，華果財穀色類成就，倉庫貯器悉皆增滿，衣服飲食湯藥所用倍勝增多，由法力故。
translation: "When this dhāraṇī teaching becomes widespread in any country, it causes the fatty, oily, and refined flavors of that land to double, the beautiful fruits and subtle flavors to increase, the bitter, pungent, and bad flavors to be avoided, the flowers and fruits, the wealth and provisions, and the various forms and types of grain to be produced, the storage vessels to be filled, and the clothing, food, and medicine to be used to double and increase because of the power of the Dharma.

source_sentence: 「若有眾生受彼飲食者，當得無病顏色成就，氣力強健憶念堅固，樂求善法遠離諸惡。
translation: "If sentient beings accept that food, they'll become disease-free and have their skin color perfected, their energy strong and their memory resolute, and they'll delight in seeking good qualities and part with bad ones.

source_sentence: 彼諸眾生若命終已，當生汝等種類之中，眷屬增長勢力具足怨不能壞，以法力故，當得四姓之所擁護，當以法義共相示誨。
translation: If those sentient beings are born among your kind after their lives end, they'll have grown dependents with strength and power, resentments that can't be broken, and because of the power of the Dharma, they'll be protected by the four families and shown the meaning of the Dharma together.

source_sentence: 汝等若能如是作者，即為供養一切三世諸佛世尊已。」
translation: If you can thus apply yourselves, you will have made offerings to all the three worldly buddhas and world-honored ones."

source_sentence: 爾時，曼陀香如來即依諸佛清淨境界智慧音聲隨類句義，以一切諸佛世尊語悉滿此剎，遍告此佛剎中一切諸菩薩摩訶薩，及釋主、梵主、摩呼羅伽主所有居此佛剎者，倍復加勸此四天下中所居住者：「汝等應當住持開示此諸佛語大集法門，擁護此經微妙正法。」
translation: At that point, the Tathāgata Mantra then filled this buddha's temple with the words of all the buddha-honored ones, relying on the meaning of the sounds of the buddhas' pure realms of wisdom and their categories, and addressed all the bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas, lords of Śākyamuni, and lords of Mahoraga living in this buddha's temple, and doubly encouraged those living under these four heavens, "You should maintain, reveal, and uphold this great collection of Dharma entries in the words of the buddhas, and safeguard the subtle right teaching of this sūtra."

source_sentence: 爾時，眾中九萬七千俱胝得忍諸菩薩摩訶薩，彌勒為首，居此佛剎者，一切同聲作如是言：「我等今者奉諸佛教，為欲供養一切三世諸如來故，於此一切諸佛世尊微妙法門，恭敬頂戴尊重如佛，悲愍成熟諸眾生故，乃至安置無上道故。
translation: At the time, 97,000 of the many bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas, and Maitreya as the head, who had attained patience and were staying at this buddha temple, all spoke together, saying, "Now, we serve the Buddhas because we want to make offerings to all the Tathāgatas of the three times, respect and adulate the subtle Dharma teachings of all the world-honored Buddhas, venerate and respect them as buddhas, pity and mature sentient beings, and even set them on the unsurpassed path.

source_sentence: 「我等於諸聚落城邑州縣國土王宮諸寂靜處，以此法門廣布顯示，為欲成熟諸眾生故，令此妙法得久住故。」
translation: "We've widely disseminated this teaching in quiet places in villages, cities, states, prefectures, lands, and royal palaces in order to mature sentient beings and make this wonderful teaching last."

source_sentence: 爾時，一切諸佛世尊來此剎者，咸作是言：「善哉，善哉！
translation: At the time, all the buddhas and world-honored ones who had come to this temple said, "Good, good!

source_sentence: 汝等如是作所應作。」
translation: You thus do what you should do."

source_sentence: 是時，一切釋梵摩呼羅伽主等居此土者，并餘來眾六十四俱胝那由他等大精味中有大威德眾生，一切同聲，作如是言：「我等於此微妙大集法門悉當受持，乃至廣為開示顯說，成熟眾生故，妙法久住故，樂法聽法者悉當擁護。
translation: At the time, all the Śakra and Brahmā Mahoraga lords and others living in this land and the rest of the sixty-four koṭīnayutas and other beings of great authority in their great essence all spoke together, saying, "We will all accept this subtle and greatly concentrated teaching, and we will explain it in detail and make it known, so that it will ripen sentient beings, the wonderful teaching will be long-lasting, and those who enjoy and listen to the teaching will all uphold it.

source_sentence: 「我等今者，奉諸佛教，隨此法門流行之處，令使一切鬪諍違背，謀計諍論，飢儉荒亂，他方怨敵，非時風雨，非時寒熱，苦辛澁味，惡人惡物悉當消滅。
translation: "Now, we, the adherents of Buddhism, will follow this teaching wherever it prevails, so that all quarrels and disagreements, conspiracies and arguments, hunger and famine, desolation, enemies from other lands, unseasonable winds and rain, unseasonable cold and heat, painful and pungent flavors, and bad people and things will all cease.

source_sentence: 安隱快樂豐饒和合，悉當成就此妙正法當令久住，倍加勤勇擁護供給正法國王，及以勤修禪定眾生悉當擁護。」
translation: Secure, happy, abundant, and harmonious, they will all achieve the long-abiding of this wonderful right teaching, and they will make doubly diligent efforts to uphold and make offerings to the king of the right teaching and to all sentient beings who diligently cultivate meditation."

source_sentence: 時，彼一切諸佛世尊同聲讚言：「善哉，善哉！
translation: All of those buddhas and world-honored ones then praised them with one voice, saying, "Good, good!

source_sentence: 善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 汝等今者應如是作，勤作自他利益之事，即於一切三世諸佛為供養已。
translation: You should thus work now, diligently performing acts for the benefit of yourselves and others, that is, after making offerings to all the buddhas of the three times.

source_sentence: 如汝等勤勞成熟諸眾生故，令此妙法得久住故，汝等皆當速得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。」
translation: As you work diligently to ripen sentient beings and make this wonderful Dharma last, you will all quickly attain unsurpassed, correct enlightenment."

source_sentence: 爾時，中四天下釋梵天主，乃至摩呼羅伽主，及大威德中最上首者，一切悉皆從坐而起，恭敬合掌，作如是言：「我等亦奉一切諸佛世尊教故，悉共光顯此妙正法擁護住持，及此大集一切諸佛所護陀羅尼印法門，當如法受。
translation: At the time, the four heavenly lords of the Śākyas and Brahmās, the lord of the mahoraga, and the foremost of the great majestic virtues all rose from their seats, joined their palms in respect, and said, "We too, in accordance with the teachings of all the buddhas and world-honored ones, have collectively revealed this wonderful right teaching, protected and sustained it, and will accept this great collection of dhāraṇī-seal dharmas protected by all the buddhas according to the teaching.

source_sentence: 「乃至於諸聚落、城邑、州縣、國土、王宮諸寂靜處，當廣開示，持妙法人擁護供給。
translation: "Even in the quiet places of settlements, cities, states, prefectures, lands, and royal palaces, they will be widely revealed to those who uphold the wonderful Dharma and make offerings to them.

source_sentence: 所有住信正法法師及聽法者，比丘、比丘尼、優婆塞、優婆夷，善男子、善女人信受此法，乃至若但書寫經卷置之家中，勤修禪定，我等於彼擁護供給種種供養，衣服飲食、華蓋幢幡、塗香末香，乃至一切醫藥資具，諸有所須善作供給。
translation: For all those who abide in faith in the true teaching, Dharma teachers and those who listen to the teaching, monks, nuns, laymen, laywomen, and good men and women who believe and accept this teaching, even if they write down sūtra scrolls and place them in their homes and diligently practice meditation, we will support and make offerings of various kinds, including clothing and food, flowers, banners, banners, incense and fragrances, and all the medical supplies that are necessary to make good offerings.

source_sentence: 「若人能於此妙法門，誦時讀時開示說時，我等自往彼法座所，為聽法故如大師想，於此法門恭敬尊重一心讚歎，諸蓋幢幡持以供養。
translation: "If someone were to recite, read, expound, and teach this wonderful teaching, we would go to their Dharma seat, listen to the teaching as a great teacher, respect, honor, and praise it with one heart, and make offerings with our floral canopies and banners.

source_sentence: 何以故？
translation: Why is that?

source_sentence: 我等於此一切諸佛之所擁護陀羅尼法門廣開示時，以法味故當得精氣，具足力，具足精進，具足志，具足念，具足智，具足善友，具足眷屬，具足所有軍眾，怨不能壞。
translation: When we explain in detail the dhāraṇī teaching that's upheld by all the buddhas, it's because of the taste of the teaching that we'll attain energy, fulfillment of strength, fulfillment of effort, fulfillment of resolve, fulfillment of mindfulness, fulfillment of knowledge, fulfillment of good friends, fulfillment of retinues, and fulfillment of all armies, and resentments won't be destroyed.

source_sentence: 是故我等令一切國界所有鬪諍謀計言訟，飢儉疾病他方怨賊，非時風雨極寒極熱災旱愆時，惡夢惡相麁澁無膩苦辛惡味，惡人、惡物諸不善分悉當消滅，倍復安隱豐熟喜樂，無病和合悉當成就。
translation: Therefore, we cause all the worlds of our countries to be filled with fights, quarrels, arguments, hunger, thirst, disease, enemies and thieves from other lands, unseasonable winds and rain, extreme cold and heat, times of trouble and drought, bad dreams and bad appearances, crude, unsubtle, bitter, pungent, and unpleasant tastes, bad people and bad things, and all the unwholesome parts of them to cease, and they'll be doubly peaceful, abundant, joyous, and without illness and combination, which will all be accomplished.

source_sentence: 「時風時雨，寒熱以時，晝夜位分半月一月，時節年歲悉令正行，諸宿星曜日月之次不令失度，泉池陂河皆令滿足，隨有眾生所依住處，瀑水漂溺我皆遮斷不令覆沒。
translation: "When it's windy, when it rains, when it's hot and cold, when it's day and night, when it's half a month and half a month, when the seasons and years are right, when the constellations and stars and the order of the sun and moon are not lost, when springs and pools and rivers are made to meet, when there are living things that depend on dwelling places and when waterfalls and drowning waters, I'll stop them and prevent them from covering us up.

source_sentence: 我等於彼國邑聚落利眾生故，所有枝葉華果根莖諸穀藥味，悉當肥膩色相鮮澤美味滋多，財穀藥味衣服莊嚴諸資具等，令諸眾生悉當具足無所減少。
translation: In those country towns and villages, for the benefit of sentient beings, our branches, leaves, flowers, fruits, roots, stems, grains, and medicines will all be fat and greasy, their appearance will be lustrous and delicious, and their wealth, grains, medicines, flavors, clothing, adornments, and other necessities will be sufficient for all sentient beings, so that nothing will be taken away from them.

source_sentence: 「彼諸眾生求善根心離諸惡業，勝福德聚，及彼壽命悉令成就。
translation: "Those sentient beings' minds seeking good roots will part with bad actions, and they'll attain a superior stock of merit and longevity.

source_sentence: 所有聚落國土，以此一切諸佛之所擁護陀羅尼法門開示，乃至書寫經卷安置家中，若讀若誦恭敬供養，於置經處。
translation: In all the villages and lands, this is the Dhāraṇī teaching embraced by all the buddhas, up to writing sūtra scrolls and placing them in homes, reading and reciting them, respecting and making offerings to them, and placing them in places where the sūtras are kept.

source_sentence: 若有剎利灌頂之王，我當擁護供給所須令無所乏，所無利益當為彼等而除斷之，所有利益當為彼等隨而與之。
translation: If there's a king of the bhadra consecration, I will guard and offer what's needed so that there's nothing to lack, remove what's lacking in benefit for them, and give them all the benefit that comes their way.

source_sentence: 一切災怪驚動不吉，惡見惡作為惡所持，惡願惡歸奸詐讚撽，幻諂妄語嫉妬瞋忿，諸慳悋等悉當消滅，正見正道直信調伏一心慚愧，如是等法悉當示誨。
translation: All calamities, monsters, and disturbances that are unlucky, bad views and deeds that are held by evil, bad vows and returns that are fraudulent and praiseworthy, falsehoods and lies, jealousy and anger, and stinginess and other stinginess will all be eliminated, and right views and right paths that are straightforward, faithful, disciplined, and conscientious will all be instructed in such things.

source_sentence: 「妃后、內宮、宰相、輔臣，主藏親族刑罰官將，一切人民、四姓男女、童男、童女等，亦當擁護供給乃至慚愧示誨。
translation: "Queens, inner sanctuaries, prime ministers, ministers-in-waiting, the lord, the treasury, relatives, punishing officials, generals, and all the people, sons, daughters, boys, and girls of the four families will also support, serve, and instruct them in modesty.

source_sentence: 所在諸方，乃至四足，亦當擁護。
translation: They'll also support them wherever they are, even down to their four feet.

source_sentence: 隨有國土以此法門宣布開示，乃至書寫經卷及經卷住處，以大勤勇彼諸眾生悉當擁護，此妙正法隨處光顯不令隱沒，我等當起精進力故，作如是事。」
translation: As many lands as there are that proclaim and reveal this teaching, write sūtra scrolls, and dwell in sūtra scrolls, those sentient beings will guard them with great diligence and courage, and this wonderful right teaching will be revealed everywhere and not be hidden from view; we will do so with the power of our energy."

source_sentence: 是時，一切諸佛世尊，悉共稱讚諸善丈夫：「善哉，善哉！
translation: At that point, all the buddhas and world-honored ones collectively praised the good gentlemen, "Good, good!

source_sentence: 諸善男子！
translation: Good sons!

source_sentence: 汝等如是作所應作，以此正法及三寶種，不令隱沒故作勤勞。
translation: You thus do what you should do, making this right teaching and the seeds of the Three Treasures not to be hidden from view and thus exerting yourselves.

source_sentence: 汝等如是，如汝所作，即於一切三世諸佛為供養已。」
translation: You thus do as you should, that is, after making offerings to all the buddhas of the three times."

source_sentence: ◎◎寶星陀羅尼經護正法品第十一爾時，世尊釋迦如來告諸大眾、釋梵天王、毘樓勒叉、毘樓博叉、提頭賴吒、毘沙門等：「諸善男子！
translation: It was then that the Bhagavān, the Śākyamuni Tathāgata, addressed the great multitude, the Śakra Deva King, Virūḍhaka, Virūpākṣa, Dhṛtarāṣṭra, and Vaiśravaṇa, "Good sons!

source_sentence: 我以大悲愍眾生故，於此五濁穢惡佛剎難得法時，願得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translation: "Because of my great compassion for sentient beings, I vowed to attain supreme perfect enlightenment when it was difficult to attain the Dharma in these five filthy buddha-temples.

source_sentence: 是中眾生墮無明闇，煩惱怨賊奸狡惱害，我為眾生滅煩惱故，退諸魔黨建立法幢，無量眾生諸苦解脫，雨大法雨退俱胝魔。
translation: Since sentient beings here fall into the darkness of ignorance and are afflicted by afflictive thieves and traitors, I'll help sentient beings cease their afflictions, turn back the forces of Māra and build a Dharma banner, liberate measureless sentient beings from suffering, and rain down a great Dharma rain to turn back the myriad Māra.

source_sentence: 「諸善男子！
translation: "Good sons!

source_sentence: 是故我今以此妙法，慇懃付囑汝等手中，如此十方無量世界，過數過量諸佛世尊，及諸菩薩摩訶薩等普來集者，以此金剛法等因緣法心建立一切法摧碎陀羅尼印句門記法門，擁護佛土并諸地味眾生所居者。
translation: Therefore, I now entrust this wonderful Dharma to your hands, so that in measureless worlds in the ten directions, more than a few world-honored buddhas and bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas, and others will gather here to establish, with this Dharma of causes and conditions, a Dharma-mind that destroys all things, a Dhāraṇī seal, a phrase, a method of entry, and a way to safeguard the Buddha's land and the taste of the grounds where sentient beings live.

source_sentence: 諸過惡消滅故，成熟眾生故，一切不善業盡無餘故，三寶種久住故，乃至一切佛事成就故，是故汝等受持擁護我妙正法，能令善根福行增長。
translation: Because all faults and evils cease, sentient beings are ripened, all unwholesome actions are ended without remainder, the seeds of the Three Treasures are long-lasting, and all Buddha-works are accomplished, therefore you will accept and uphold my wonderful right teaching, which will lead to the growth of good roots and meritorious conduct.

source_sentence: 「若溫誦教示為他說，授趣三歸依優婆塞護住淨梵行，諸善根等福行增長；若修初禪福行增長，乃至修滅受想定；若須陀洹果，乃至佛菩提果福行善根，如是等相皆得增長，現在所作乃至未來當作然妙法燈，能令一切福行增長，是故付囑汝等手中。
translation: "If you warmly recite, teach, and instruct others to follow the path of the three refugee Upāsaka and maintain a pure religious practice, the good roots and other meritorious practices will increase; if you cultivate the growth of good practices in the first dhyāna, even as you cultivate the concentration of ceasing feelings and perceptions; if you cultivate the good roots of meritorious practices in the fruit of stream entry or even the fruit of Buddhahood and enlightenment, all these things will increase, and what's done now and what's to be done in the future will become a blazing lamp of the wonderful Dharma that will cause all good practices to increase; therefore, I entrust it to your hands.

source_sentence: 如來所覺妙法令熾然故，勸發汝等福德增長，是故付囑汝等手中。
translation: Because the Tathāgata's awakening is so blazing with the wonderful Dharma, it encourages you to increase your virtue, and it's therefore entrusted to your hands.

source_sentence: 「若未來世於此法門，乃至書寫經卷安置家中，以法力故，一切惡業悉當滅盡。
translation: "If you use this teaching or even write a sūtra scroll and place it in your home in a future life, all bad actions will be ended because of the power of the teaching.

source_sentence: 隨所有處，若在村城，若欲受持，當淨洗身著新淨衣，以華布散燒種種香，敷種種氈褥，嚴師子座，開示此法、說此法門，乃至書寫經卷受持讀誦。
translation: Wherever you go, if you're in a village or town and want to memorize it, you'll cleanse yourselves, put on new, pure clothing, scatter flowers and cloth, burn various kinds of incense, spread out various kinds of blankets, and adorn a lion's seat to reveal this teaching and explain this teaching, even as you write and memorize the sūtra scrolls.

source_sentence: 若汝等於彼不來聽法，擁護法師及聽法者，自他惡業盡故，汝等則為欺誑諸佛，愚失正道。」
translation: If you don't come there to listen to the teaching and support the Dharma teacher and those who listen to the teaching, you will end your own bad karma and others, and you will then deceive the buddhas and foolishly lose the right path."

source_sentence: 爾時，娑婆世界主梵天王白佛言：「世尊！
translation: At that point, the lord of the Saṃbha world, Brahma King, said to the Buddha, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 若於今時若未來世，隨所有處，乃至此妙正法未滅已來，若聚落城邑州縣國土，邊疆遠處王城宮內，若僧伽藍、若寂靜處，若婆羅門家、若長者大家、若庶民家，若說法師、比丘、比丘尼、優婆塞、優婆夷，及餘清信善男子、善女人等，好洗浴好塗身著新淨衣，散華布飾莊嚴道場，燒種種香敷種種繒綵設種種味，昇師子座，廣為他人開示演說此陀羅尼印，若書、若讀時，我共無量百千徒眾，當往彼處圍繞聽法，擁護彼法師故，及諸聽法者自他惡業盡故，一切善法成熟故，大妙正法熾然故，入大智明第一道故，彼諸城邑乃至庶民家，我當擁護彼諸眾生，令彼眾生財穀豐饒倉庫盈滿故。
translation: 若於今時若未來世，隨所有處，乃至此妙正法未滅已來，若聚落城邑州縣國土，邊疆遠處王城宮內，若僧伽藍、若寂靜處，若婆羅門家、若長者大家、若庶民家，若說法師、比丘、比丘尼、優婆塞、優婆夷，及餘清信善男子、善女人等，好洗浴好塗身著新淨衣，散華布飾莊嚴道場，燒種種香敷種種繒綵設種種味，昇師子座，廣為他人開示演說此陀羅尼印，若書、若讀時，我共無量百千徒眾，當往彼處圍繞聽法，擁護彼法師故，及諸聽法者自他惡業盡故，一切善法成熟故，大妙正法熾然故，入大智明第一道故，彼諸城邑乃至庶民家，我當擁護彼諸眾生，令彼眾生財穀豐饒倉庫盈滿故。

source_sentence: 若我不來聞所未聞，即於一切佛世尊前違昔誓願。」
translation: If I don't come and hear what I haven't heard, I'll be in violation of my past vows before all the world-honored buddhas."

source_sentence: 時，梵天王即於佛前而說呪曰：「多地也他鴦咎呵澄(去音)伽否囉茶(去)拏(一)　耶弭吐(二)　佉佉(三)　佉婆(四)　佉婆(五)　吉利那佉婆(六)　娑婆呵(七)」時梵天王說此呪已，重白佛言：「世尊！
translation: Thereupon, the king of the Brahmadeva gods spoke the dhāraṇī before the Buddha, saying, "Dhṛtiyathāyangkukhachen(d) gavāṃsa(d) na(i) yamitu(ii) khaṭṭṭika(iii) khaṭṭṭika(iv) khaṭṭṭika(v) jirinakha(vi) svāhā(vii)." After speaking this dhāraṇī, the king of the Brahmadeva gods repeatedly said to the Buddha, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 若我於彼說法師處，不來聽者、不擁護者，乃至財穀豐饒倉庫增長故，眾生充足故，即違本誓願。」
translation: If I don't come to listen to or embrace that Dharma preacher, even if my storehouse grows rich with provisions and there are enough sentient beings, that would be a violation of my original vow."

source_sentence: 爾時，一切諸佛世尊，及大菩薩摩訶薩，一切天人、人、非人等，同聲讚彼大梵天王：「善哉！
translation: At that point, all the buddhas, the great bodhisattvas, the great mahāsattvas, and all the gods, humans, and nonhumans praised that great Brahma King with one voice, "Good!

source_sentence: 善哉！」
translation: Excellent!"

source_sentence: 爾時，釋天主憍尸迦白佛言：「世尊！
translation: It was then that Kauśika, the lord of the Śākyas, said to the Buddha, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 隨所在處，若今現在若未來世，乃至村城，若我不往聞所未聞，即於一切佛世尊前，違昔誓願為有過者。」
translation: "Wherever I am, whether it's in the present or future time, or even in a village or town, if I don't go there and hear what I haven't heard, then I will be in violation of my past vows before all the buddhas and world-honored ones."

source_sentence: 即於佛前而說咒曰：「多地也他佉婆弭履佉(一)　佉婆弭履佉(二)　那閜伽(三)　阿母若(四)　阿母婆呵(五)　阿呿吒(六)　阿吐(七)　婆捨吐(八)　嗜那婆囉揭(九)(墟偈反)　娑婆呵(十)」時，釋天主說此呪已，重白佛言：「世尊！
translation: He then spoke the mantra before the Buddha, saying, "Dhṛtiyathākhavajraka(i) Khavajraka(ii) Nasyunga(iii) Amogha(iv) Amoghavahā(v) Ayanṭa(vi) Aṭu(vii) Vāsikha(viii) Jinabaragha(ix) (śramaṇa) Sāvahā(x)." After reciting this mantra, Lord Śakra then repeated it to the Buddha, saying, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 若我不作如昔所願者，此即是我自違誓願為有過者。」
translation: If I don't do what I've vowed in the past, this would be a violation of my own vow."

source_sentence: 是時，大眾乃至人、非人等，咸稱歎言：「善哉！
translation: At that point, the whole crowd, both human and non-human, praised them, saying, "Good!

source_sentence: 善哉！
translation: Bravo!

source_sentence: 釋迦天主！」
translation: Lord Śākyamuni!"

source_sentence: 爾時，毘樓勒叉天王白佛言：「世尊！
translation: At that point, the Virūḍhaka Heavenly King said to the Buddha, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 隨所在處，若今現在若未來世，乃至城邑有此法門，我若不往不作擁護，世尊！
translation: "Bhagavān, if this teaching were to exist anywhere, in the present, in the future, or even in a city, and I didn't go there and didn't defend it, then!

source_sentence: 此即是我自違誓願為有過者。」
translation: This is a violation of my own vow to be wrong."

source_sentence: 即於佛前而說呪曰：「多地也他歐佉(一)　那婆娑荼(二)　娑母陀囉賜兒(三)　哆他負多(四)　婆樓(上音)拏婆婆囉闍(五)　娑婆呵(六)」是時，大眾乃至人、非人等，咸共稱歎毘樓勒叉大護世言：「善哉！
translation: He then spoke a mantra before the Buddha, saying, "Dhṛtiyathā Okha(i) Navasatha(ii) Sāmaudrāśir(iii) Dhātajāta(iv) Varuṇa-prabhāja(v) Sāvahā(vi)." The whole crowd, both human and non-human, then praised Virūḍhaka as the great protector of the world, saying, "Good!

source_sentence: 善哉！」
translation: Excellent!"

source_sentence: 爾時，毘樓博叉天王白佛言：「世尊！
translation: At that point, the Virūpākṣa Heavenly King said to the Buddha, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 若今現在、若未來世，隨所在處乃至城邑有此法門，我若不往為作擁護聞所未聞，即於佛前違昔誓願為有過者。」
translation: If I didn't go to any place or town in the present or future that had this teaching and defend it like I've never heard it before, I would be in violation of my past vows before the Buddha and would be in error."

source_sentence: 即於佛前而說呪曰：「多地也他闍老伽(一)　阿到伽(二)　阿歷耄伽(三)　阿歷麼(四)　娑連社婆(五)　脾(毘也反)耶母闍(六)　娑婆呵(七)」是時，大眾乃至人、非人等，咸共稱歎毘樓博叉天王言：「善哉！
translation: He then spoke the mantra before the Buddha, saying, "Dadiya tajra (1) ātagar (2) ālyasagar (3) ālyamā (4) Śāriensaprāpta (5) Śubha (6) Śubhah (7)." The whole crowd, both humans and non-humans, then praised the god Virūpākṣa, saying, "Good!

source_sentence: 善哉！」
translation: Excellent!"

source_sentence: 爾時，提頭賴吒天王白佛言：「世尊！
translation: It was then that Dhṛtarāṣṭra said to the Buddha, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 若今現在、若未來世，隨所有處乃至城邑有此法門，我若不往為作擁護聞所未聞，即於佛前違昔誓願為有過者。」
translation: If there were any place or town in the present or future that had this teaching, and I didn't go there to defend it and hear about it, I would be in violation of my past vows before the Buddha and would be in error."

source_sentence: 即於佛前而說呪曰：「多地也他頻頭社婆(一)　佉婆社婆(二)　囉母佉(三)　叉娑囉(四)　否迦婆呵(五)　阿(上聲)末伽婆吒(六)　娑婆呵(七)」是時，大眾乃至人、非人等，咸共稱歎提頭賴吒天王言：「善哉！
translation: He then spoke a mantra before the Buddha, saying, "Didyatapuṣpa(1) Kashasheva(2) Rāmaukha(3) Kāśyapa(4) Nāgapahā(5) A(s) Maghaparṭha(6) Svāhā(7)." The whole crowd, both humans and non-humans, then praised Deva King Titurāṭa, saying, "Good!

source_sentence: 善哉！」
translation: Excellent!"

source_sentence: 爾時，毘沙門天王白佛言：「世尊！
translation: It was then that the god Vaiśravaṇa said to the Buddha, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 若今現在、若未來世，隨所有處乃至城邑有此法門，我若不往為作擁護聞所未聞，即於佛前違昔誓願為有過者。」
translation: If there were any place or town in the present or future that had this teaching, and I didn't go there to defend it and hear what I've never heard before, I would be in violation of my past vows before the Buddha and would be in error."

source_sentence: 便於佛前而說呪曰：「多地也他簉(初後反)陀利(一)　簉簉簉陀利(二)　佉陀利(三)　阿儞簉陀利(四)　那也那簉陀利(五)　醯履哆簉陀利(六)　娑伽囉醯履哆簉陀利(七)　僧九娑簉陀利(八)　達摩叉耶簉陀利(九)　娑婆呵(十)」是時，大眾乃至人、非人等，咸共稱歎毘沙門天王言：「善哉！
translation: He then spoke the mantra before the Buddha, "Dhṛtarāṣṭhagiri(1) Jītijījījījīdhāri(2) Khādiri(3) Ānījījījīdhāri(4) Nayanarjījījīdhāri(5) Hiruddhajījīdhāri(6) Sāgara Hiruddhajījīdhāri(7) Saṃkusumajījīdhāri(8) Dharmakṣemajījīdhāri(9) Sāvāhā(10)." The whole crowd, both humans and nonhumans, then praised King Vaiśravaṇa, saying, "Good!

source_sentence: 善哉！」
translation: Excellent!"

source_sentence: 爾時，於此世界，此四天下所有一百一十二夜叉大將主將軍眾，於四天下守衛擁護者，復有四萬夜叉，於此四天下居住者，復有大神通中最勝諸天、龍、夜叉、乾闥婆、阿修羅、伽樓羅、緊那羅、摩呼羅伽等，咸共同聲白佛言：「世尊！
translation: At the time, in this world, there were a hundred and twelve generals of great generals of yakṣas guarding and protecting the four worlds, forty thousand yakṣas living in the four worlds, and the most distinguished among the great supernormal powers of gods, dragons, yakṣas, gandharvas, asuras, garuḍas, kiṃnaras, and mahoragas, all speaking together, said to the Buddha, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 若今現在或未來世，隨所在處有此法門，乃至此妙法燈不滅已來，若在聚落、城邑、州縣、國土、王城、王宮、阿蘭若處，若婆羅門家、長者家、居士家、庶民家，若法師、若比丘、比丘尼、優婆塞、優婆夷，復有諸信心善男子、善女人，應好洗浴以香塗身著新淨衣，散華布飾莊嚴道場，敷置種種氈褥衣服，燒種種香，種種美味盛滿淨器，施設妙好師子法座。
translation: "If this teaching exists anywhere in the present or future world, even after this wonderful lamp of the Dharma doesn't cease, if it's in a village, town, state, territory, king's city, king's palace, or forest, in a house of a Brāhmaṇa, house of an elder, house of a householder, or house of a commoner, or in the house of a Dharma teacher, monk, monk, nun, layman, or laywoman of faith, then those good men and good women should wash themselves well, rub their bodies with incense, put on new and clean clothing, spread flowers and decorate the site of the path, spread out various blankets and mats, burn various kinds of incense, fill pure vessels with various kinds of delicious foods, and set up a wonderful lion's seat at the Dharma table.

source_sentence: 昇此坐已，廣為他人分別開示此經，及讀誦時，我等一一與無量百千眷屬圍繞往彼聽法，為擁護法師，為擁護己眾及餘眾生。
translation: After ascending to this seat, he explained this sūtra in detail for others, and when he recited it, we each went there with measureless hundreds of thousands of retinues to listen to the teaching, in order to support the Dharma teacher and to support his own people and the other sentient beings.

source_sentence: 「為擁護故，成熟眾生故，我等若不往彼城邑乃至庶民家，及以眷屬不受教勅不成熟眾生，不令眾生豐饒財穀倉庫盈滿；又復一切鬪諍，飢饉疾病，他方怨敵，非時風雨，極寒極熱，諸災難等若不遮斷，我等則為欺誑過去未來現在諸佛世尊，違本誓願空無所得，得白癩病、退失神通、身體爛壞。
translation: "If we don't go to those towns and villages or even to the homes of common people, if our retinues don't accept the teaching and order them to ripen sentient beings, if we don't cause sentient beings to have an abundance of wealth and storage, and if we don't stop all the fights, hunger and disease, enemies from other places, unseasonable winds and rain, extreme cold and heat, and other calamities, then we'll be deceiving the buddhas and world-honored ones of the past, future, and present, disobeying our vows, becoming leprosy, losing our psychic powers, and having our bodies decay.

source_sentence: 「世尊！
translation: "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 雖復如此，我等今者并諸眷屬，若今現在、若未來世，於此世界四天下處，決定光顯釋迦如來微妙正法，及信此法人當為擁護供給所須，所作成熟惡業滅盡。
translation: Even so, we and our retinues will certainly reveal the subtle and fine true teaching of the Śākyamuni Tathāgata in the four worlds and places of this world, both in the present and in the future, and those who believe in this teaching will embrace it and make offerings as needed, so that the bad karma they've accomplished will cease.

source_sentence: 我等於此法門教示開顯彼說法人，又令說法人及聽法者財穀豐饒，諸所受用悉當增長，於佛所說不壞不滅法，悉當受持。」
translation: We will teach and reveal this Dharma teaching to those who teach it, cause those who teach it and those who listen to it to be prosperous and provide for the growth of all the things they enjoy, and they will all accept the Dharma taught by the Buddha that doesn't perish or perish."

source_sentence: 時彼一切諸佛世尊，一切大眾、人、非人等，咸共同聲，讚彼天、龍、護法神等：「善哉！
translation: All of those buddhas and world-honored ones, as well as all the people, humans and non-humans, spoke together, praising the gods, dragons, and dharma-protecting spirits, "Good!

source_sentence: 善哉！
translation: Bravo!

source_sentence: 汝等如是善所應作。」
translation: This is a good thing for you to do."

source_sentence: 爾時，懷樂菩薩於大眾中即白釋迦如來言：「世尊！
translation: At that point, the Blissful Monk addressed the Śākyamuni Tathāgata in the crowd, saying, "Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 云何此百俱胝所有諸魔并諸眷屬，一切盡皆來到此耶？」
translation: How did all of these hundred koṭīs of Māra and their retinues come here?"

source_sentence: 佛言：「善男子！
translation: The Buddha said, "Good sons!

source_sentence: 此一切魔并諸眷屬悉來此會。」
translation: All these Māras and their retinues have come to this meeting."

source_sentence: 懷樂菩薩復白佛言：「云何？
translation: Again, the Blissful Monks said to the Buddha, "What is it?

source_sentence: 世尊！
translation: Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 此一切魔并諸眷屬，於三寶中得清淨信不？」
translation: Will all these Māras and their retinues attain pure faith in the Three Treasures?"

source_sentence: 佛言：「不也。
translation: The Buddha said, "No.

source_sentence: 復次，善男子！
translation: "Furthermore, good sons!

source_sentence: 此諸惡魔一千眷屬，於三寶中而不得意，不清淨信返生瞋恨。
translation: These are the thousand followers of Māra who don't find joy in the Three Treasures and become angry when they don't have pure faith.

source_sentence: 若今現在、若未來世，乃至此妙正法熾然已來，常勤方便伺求其短，令正法滅壞故，隱沒故。
translation: Whether in the present or future time, or even after this wonderful right teaching blazes forth, they'll always diligently pursue their shortcomings with skillful means, causing the right teaching to cease and disappear.

source_sentence: 如是復有十八諸魔，并其眷屬一萬三千；如是復有二百諸魔，并其眷屬二千一百；彼諸魔等，於三寶中悉不得意，不清淨信返生瞋恨。
translation: Thus, there are 18 Māras and 13,000 of their followers, and there are 200 Māras and 2,100 of their followers who don't find satisfaction in the Three Treasures and don't have pure faith, so they become angry.

source_sentence: 若今現在及未來世，乃至此妙正法廣流行時，常勤方便伺求其短，令我教法及妙正法滅壞故，隱沒故。
translation: If in the present and future lives, even when this wonderful right teaching is widely disseminated, they'll always diligently pursue its shortcomings, causing my teaching and wonderful right teaching to cease and disappear.

source_sentence: 何以故？
translation: Why is that?

source_sentence: 往昔已來憎嫉力持故，不種善根故，為惡知識所攝故，於善離欲無受樂中，永無悕望無欲願故。
translation: As a result of the power of hatred and envy from the past, they don't plant good roots, are taken in by bad friends, and never have expectations or desires in the midst of goodness and freedom from desire.

source_sentence: 「彼諸魔心，於如來心及菩薩心未曾和順，住不淨信不解脫故。
translation: "Those Māra minds have never conformed to the Tathāgata mind or the bodhisattva mind, so they abide in impure faith and aren't liberated.

source_sentence: 是諸魔等今雖不信，以見如來大集妙色，及得聞此甚深陀羅尼。
translation: Even though they don't believe them now, these Māras have seen the Tathāgata's marvelous form in great accumulation and have heard this very profound dhāraṇī.

source_sentence: 以是因緣故，於後時得清淨信得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。」
translation: Because of these causes and conditions, they then attained pure faith and unsurpassed, correct enlightenment."

source_sentence: 懷樂菩薩作如是言：「希有世尊！
translation: The Blissful Monks said, "It's rare, Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 希有善逝！
translation: May there be a good death!

source_sentence: 彼等眾生乃至不種善根，若但耳聞觸此法門，如是因緣故，當得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。」
translation: Those sentient beings, even those who don't cultivate good roots, will attain unsurpassed, correct enlightenment if they only hear and touch this teaching."

source_sentence: 爾時，有魔名曰不去——曾於佛所極多供養，於三寶中淨信不動，得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記——作大仙人形從坐而起，於釋迦如來前合掌，遍觀如來，世尊威力加故，於一切佛剎大聲遍滿，作如是言：「諸佛世尊一心念我，一切菩薩摩訶薩，及天、龍、夜叉、乾闥婆、阿修羅、伽樓羅、緊那羅、摩呼羅伽、人、非人等，魔及眷屬聽我所說。
translation: At the time, a demon named Māra who had made numerous offerings to the Buddha, remained pure and faithful among the Three Treasures, and attained the assurance of unsurpassed, corrected, and complete enlightenment rose from his seat in the form of a great sage and joined his palms in front of the Tathāgata and contemplated the Tathāgata with the authority of the Bhagavān, filled all the buddha bases with a loud voice, saying, "The Bhagavān is unified in his mind about me, and all the bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas, gods, dragons, yakṣas, gandharvas, asuras, garuḍas, kiṃnaras, mahoragas, humans, nonhumans, and others, demons, and their retinues listen to what I say.

source_sentence: 今此世尊釋迦牟尼大悲導師，往昔之時誓願如是，於極穢惡五濁佛剎，得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，作逆眾生誹謗妙法謗無聖人，具不善根惡行相應心相續成就者，普令出過三惡道故，成熟三乘故，修忍三昧陀羅尼故，引向清淨諸佛剎土，令三寶種久住不斷，成就大願，斷除一切穢濁佛剎，成滿一切功德莊嚴。
translation: Now, the Bhagavān, the great compassionate teacher Śākyamuni, has vowed in the past to attain supreme perfect enlightenment in the five contaminated buddha bases, to act against sentient beings, to denigrate the wonderful Dharma, to denigrate noble people who lack good roots, to continuously accomplish mind in association with bad actions, to cause them to escape from the three bad destinies, to ripen the three vehicles, to cultivate the dhāraṇī of the samādhi of patience, to lead them to the pure buddha-lands, to make the seeds of the three treasures long-abiding and uninterrupted, to fulfill the great vow, to end all contamination in the buddha bases, and to accomplish the adornment of all merits.

source_sentence: 「是故，我等當如是作，為令如來正教久住，及妙正法得不滅壞。
translation: "Therefore, we will thus do this, so that the Tathāgata's correct teaching will long endure and the wonderful correct teaching will not perish.

source_sentence: 若今現在、若未來世，無有若魔、若魔眷屬，於如來所受正法欲滅壞隱沒，乃至不能惱一眾生，唯除少隨順不具信者。
translation: If there are no Māra or Māra's followers in the present or future world who want the right teaching received from the Tathāgata to perish and disappear, it won't even be able to disturb a single sentient being except for a few who follow it and don't have faith in it.

source_sentence: 若持此妙法者、隨順此法者、說此法者、聽此法者，比丘、比丘尼、優婆塞、優婆夷，及餘信心善男子、善女人，勤修三業能自策勤，坐禪誦經營理塔寺，恒勤作福，勤事供養佛法僧寶，勤斷三界煩惱繫縛，勤斷一切眾生諸苦，悉令解脫者。
translation: If someone adheres to this wonderful teaching, follows this teaching, teaches this teaching, or listens to this teaching, monks, nuns, laymen, laywomen, and other faithful good men and good women will diligently cultivate the three activities, work on their own diligence, meditate, recite, operate stūpas and temples, constantly work to produce merit, diligently serve and make offerings to the treasures of the Buddha, Dharma, and Saṃgha, diligently end the bonds of affliction in the three realms, and diligently end the suffering of all sentient beings so that they'll all be liberated.

source_sentence: 彼等行人，若為魔使、若魔女、魔男、若魔眷屬欲惱亂彼，伺求其短障難善業，作亂心因者，為彼等故，我今現前請諸世尊，當與我力善業成就，憐愍我故。
translation: If those practitioners are messengers of Māra, women, men, or their followers who want to disturb them, seek their shortcomings, hinder good actions, and create causes of mental disturbance, I now ask the Bhagavān to give me the strength to achieve good actions and to have compassion on them.

source_sentence: 一切菩薩摩訶薩等，并一切魔及魔眷屬，一切天、龍、夜叉、乾闥婆、阿修羅、伽樓羅、緊那羅、摩呼羅伽、人、非人等，所有一切來此佛剎者，及大地眾，為欲利益諸眾生故，佛教正法得久住故，當憐愍我，今欲說呪與我成就。
translation: All the bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas, all Māra and Māra's followers, all gods, dragons, yakṣas, gandharvas, asuras, garuḍas, kiṃnaras, mahoragas, humans, nonhumans, and so forth, all those who come to this buddha temple, and all the great multitude, in order to benefit sentient beings and make the right Buddhist teaching long-lasting, will have compassion on me and give me a spell to accomplish that.

source_sentence: 「若魔、若魔眷屬，欲惱彼等人及法者，我當降伏令其心亂、令其身苦、令身惱縮退失神通，故說此呪句。
translation: "If Māra or Māra's followers want to disturb those people and the Dharma, I will subdue them, causing their minds to be disturbed, their bodies to be pained, and their bodies to be constricted and lose their powers, so I'll say this dhāraṇī.

source_sentence: 若諸惡魔并魔眷屬、魔男、魔女，若魔使等，若於佛教起一念惡不清淨心，惱亂諸比丘、比丘尼、優婆塞、優婆夷，乃至但起一剎那心，欲作惱亂退失善分，若於村城國邑，乃至王城宮內，邊疆靜處，隨所在處，有此法門開示分別。
translation: If evil demons, their followers, demon men, demon women, or demon messengers arouse a single bad and impure thought in Buddhism that disturbs monks, nuns, laymen, and laywomen, or even if they only arouse a momentary thought that wants to disturb and lose the good part, then this is the teaching that will reveal and discern the location of such a place, whether it's a village, a town, a palace, a royal city, or a quiet place on the border.

source_sentence: 若於此等起破壞心，乃至一剎那，於彼諸方鬪諍疫死，飢儉諸病，他方怨敵，非時風雨，極寒極熱，瀑水卒起，地動地吼，火星流墮，有如是等諸惡相起，或於華葉果實諸穀藥味，欲於彼等起破壞心時，即令彼魔乃至魔使，欝熱所燒熏污爛臭，無所能作不能起舉，五繫縛之令其自見，乃至一切支節，捲縮不能舒展，令得黑闇不覩光色，退失神通心意錯亂，令彼六根不能緣境。」
translation: If these destructive thoughts arise even for a split second, then in those places where there's fighting, epidemics, famine, illness, enemies from another place, unseasonable winds and rain, extreme cold and heat, raging floods, earthquakes, sparks flying down, such bad appearances arising, or the taste of flowers, leaves, fruits, grains, and medicines, when they want to cause destructive thoughts in those places, they cause those Māra and even Māra's messengers to be burned by the burning fever, be smeared and rotten, be incapable of lifting anything, be bound by the five bonds so that they see for themselves, be contracted and unable to stretch, be made dark and unable to see light, lose their psychic abilities and have their minds distorted, and cause their six faculties to be unable to perceive objects."

source_sentence: 即說呪曰：「多地也他阿摩離(一)　阿[馬*甘](呼甘反)麼離(二)　阿[馬*甘]麼離(三)　阿闍婆婆(四)　阿闍婆婆(五)　茂囉沙離(六)　鞞夜佉娑離(七)　社麼娑離(八)　呵呵呵呵呵呵(九)　瞿囉娑吒(十)　社那呿伽(十一)　爾也呿伽(十二)　泌(毘蜜反)爾也婆娑呿伽(十三)　阿茂叉囉(十四)　叉叉叉叉叉叉(十五)　茂囉婆呵(十六)　呿伽娑婆呿若(十七)　娑婆跛履跛哆茂囉(十八)　阿(上音)若若婆由若(十九)　氈陀囉嗽履也若若(二十)　那婆(上音)若若(二十一)　丘囉叉若若(二十二)　婆婆若若(二十三)　倍哆句胝哆他(上音)多若若(二十四)　薩婆爾脾囉地(上音)史恥多若若(二十五)　婆迦囉麼(二十六)　底履健哆叉婆(二十七)　叉麼摩叉摩若(二十八)　差(初几反)上哆摩囉毘所也(二十九)　娑婆呵(三十)」爾時，不去魔說是呪時，於剎那頃，由得一切智擁護故，諸魔境界悉皆滅壞無所成就。
translation: 即說呪曰：「多地也他阿摩離(一)　阿[馬*甘](呼甘反)麼離(二)　阿[馬*甘]麼離(三)　阿闍婆婆(四)　阿闍婆婆(五)　茂囉沙離(六)　鞞夜佉娑離(七)　社麼娑離(八)　呵呵呵呵呵呵(九)　瞿囉娑吒(十)　社那呿伽(十一)　爾也呿伽(十二)　泌(毘蜜反)爾也婆娑呿伽(十三)　阿茂叉囉(十四)　叉叉叉叉叉叉(十五)　茂囉婆呵(十六)　呿伽娑婆呿若(十七)　娑婆跛履跛哆茂囉(十八)　阿(上音)若若婆由若(十九)　氈陀囉嗽履也若若(二十)　那婆(上音)若若(二十一)　丘囉叉若若(二十二)　婆婆若若(二十三)　倍哆句胝哆他(上音)多若若(二十四)　薩婆爾脾囉地(上音)史恥多若若(二十五)　婆迦囉麼(二十六)　底履健哆叉婆(二十七)　叉麼摩叉摩若(二十八)　差(初几反)上哆摩囉毘所也(二十九)　娑婆呵(三十)」爾時，不去魔說是呪時，於剎那頃，由得一切智擁護故，諸魔境界悉皆滅壞無所成就。

source_sentence: 如是，如是，所有欲作不利益者，皆不成果。
translation: Thus, thus, all those who want to do something that doesn't benefit them will not be able to achieve it.

source_sentence: 是時，一切諸佛世尊，咸共稱讚：「善哉！
translation: At that point, all the buddhas and world-honored ones praised them together, "Good!

source_sentence: 善哉！」
translation: Excellent!"

source_sentence: 及一切菩薩摩訶薩、天龍、夜叉、人、非人等，亦共稱讚：「善哉！
translation: And all the bodhisattvas, mahāsattvas, gods, dragons, yakṣas, humans, and nonhumans praised them together, saying, "Good!

source_sentence: 善哉！」
translation: Excellent!"

source_sentence: 是時，大地皆大震動，四海涌沸，諸須彌山王，魔及眷屬悉大驚動。
translation: At that point, the whole earth trembles greatly, the four seas boil, and the Sumeru mountain kings, Māra, and their retinues are all greatly alarmed.

source_sentence: 是時惡鬼神等亦復如是，唯除於佛教法清淨信者，及得忍菩薩不生驚怖。
translation: So did the hostile spirits and so forth, except for those who have pure faith in the Buddhist teachings and the bodhisattvas who have attained patience and aren't frightened.

source_sentence: 爾時，魔王問堅固慧菩薩言：「善男子！
translation: The king of Māra then asked the Bodhisattva of Stubborn Wisdom, "Good man!

source_sentence: 何等因緣，此不去魔有是勝力？
translation: What are the causes and conditions that give this nonreturner Māra such overpowering power?

source_sentence: 是誰加彼？
translation: Who is it that adds this?

source_sentence: 此無慈悲，令我部黨及我境界力之所作，一切散滅悉皆退壞；乃更建立沙門瞿曇，黑黨親眷說斷惡見。
translation: Without compassion, this caused my clan and the works of my objective power to all dissipate and vanish, and then he established the ascetic Gautama, a black clan of relatives, to say, "Stop that bad view!

source_sentence: 我即聞此陀羅尼時，令我身體臭惡爛壞無所能為，一切諸方為我黑闇，不見諸光大熱所燒耶！」
translation: When I heard this dhāraṇī, it caused my body to stink and rot like nothing else, and all directions were made dark for me, so I couldn't see the lights and great heat that burned them."

source_sentence: 爾時，堅固菩薩答魔王言：「此是一切諸佛世尊神力加護，亦是一切人、非人等，與此不去魔力故，令汝等一切諸魔境界之力，如所欲作悉皆摧碎。
translation: At that point, the resolute bodhisattva answered the demon king, "This is the spiritual protection of all the buddhas, the spiritual power of all people and non-people, and the power of this nonretrogressing demon that causes the power of all your demonic realms to break down whatever you want to do.

source_sentence: 今說此不退陀羅尼句時，汝今應生清淨信心，於如來所，發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心。
translation: When you speak these words of the nonretrogressing dhāraṇī, you should now give rise to pure faith and arouse in the Tathāgata the mind of unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment.

source_sentence: 汝今若能如是作者，此身口意諸苦惱觸悉當解脫。」
translation: If you can thus produce it now, these painful feelings of body, speech, and thought will all be liberated."

source_sentence: 是時，魔王答堅固菩薩言：「我今寧當忍耐此苦，令身口意受於無量無數大苦惱事，至於最後邊際劫，我終不發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心。」
translation: The Māra King then answered the resolute bodhisattva, "Now, I would rather endure this suffering and subject my body, speech, and mind to measureless and incalculable great afflictions, and I will never give rise to the mind of unsurpassed, correct, and complete enlightenment until the final limit of the eon."

source_sentence: ◎寶星陀羅尼經卷第九
translation: Jewel Star Dhāraṇī Sutra, Volume 9
